Left		0x00000301	0x00008100
Right		0x00000302	0x00008100
Up		0x0000030C	0x00008100
Down		0x00000306	0x00008100
a	        0x00008103	0x00008100
b	        0x00008104	0x00008100
c	        0x00008107	0x00008100
d	        0x00008108	0x00008100
BackSpace	                0x00000300	0x00008100
Return		0x00000320	0x00008100
